casebody.data:
VAN REYPEN
v.
TEETER. No. 84PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2006. Charles M. Viser, Charlotte, for Van Reypen Associates, Inc. D. Lane Matthews, Charlotte, for Gerald Teeter, et al. Isaac T. Avery, III, Raleigh, for NC Asso. Police Attorneys. Kimberly N. Overton, for NC Conference of DA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of June 2006 by Attorney General for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of June 2006."
